website_summaries.verdict: The expensive, exercise-focused B&O Beoplay H5 earphones deliver an excellent Bluetooth audio experience.
pros: Balanced audio performance with bright highs and deep bass
Multiple eartip options and magnetic charging dock included

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound & design - just a little too much cable noise!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is outstanding as expected. You will struggle to match this. The Design, is outstanding again, as expected. Love the charger, love the pouch, and the packaging was great too. Haven't had any issues with calls or people not hearing me - it's been fine, and I love the app that comes with it allowing you to adjust the sound. The only reason this is a 4 star, and not a 5 - is the level of "microphonics" sounds, which are produced due to the cable rubbing against your clothes. It's noticeable, so you have to either stay quite still - or wear t-shirts, soft cotton based clothing. A work shirt will be quite noisy in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Farshad Dabeshkhoy

customer_reviews.title: The most unpractical design ever: you must remove the ear fins to charge your earphones
customer_reviews.text: The ear fins don't fit in the charger which means that, everytime you charge them, you MUST remove the ear tips, then remove the ear fins, then charge your earphones. And after charging, you MUST put the ear fins back again, and put the ear tips back again before you can use your earphones. How unpractical. And considering how thin the ear fins are, I doubt they are very durable if you have to remove them and put them back everyday... This is the worst and most unpractical design ever. And it retails at RRP £229? Really??
customer_reviews.author: Abracadabra

customer_reviews.title: Good not Great, especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: I'll just sum it up: Good: * Great Sound * Great that magnets (when touching) turn earphones off Disappointing: * Does not fully pair with older Bluetooth devices (2013 iPod nano touch). Meaning I have to go to Bluetooth settings each time to connect. Works perfectly with iPhone X. * Not loud enough (No\Not good noise cancellation) * Battery life is poor in comparison to competitors.A little over 3hrs - 4hrs * Proprietary charger * Be sure to apply the firmware update to make these livable
customer_reviews.author: Mikael

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bluetooth earphones
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much having lost the first pair I took a long time to buy I caved and bought a second. The charging dock is fast and quirky, the second set came with a new feature to help hold the earbud in. The variety of earbuds from silicone and memory foam are great as is the magnetic off switch which acts as a holder or the little clip. I do think there are products with slightly better battery life but I find mine consistently last longer than advertised, the sound quality on calls is also amazing. I’ll look forward to adding to my collection soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Scott Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It is official! I am so satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, as the tittle says, I can find its warrenty information according to its series number, and I have consumed 2 products from this brand in retail store before, I can recognise the fantastic clear sound. It was the Black Friday that I buy it, it came to my door the very next day. Nice Bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Yuan Huang

customer_reviews.title: Fine...unless you move
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great - as long as you're perfectly still. Any kind of movement results in the worst cord noise (microphonics) I've ever experienced. Using a braided cord instead of rubberised finish was a bad decision B&O!! I bought these to replace a pair of Jaybird X3s (as the battery has finally started to go), but I've had to go back to using the X3s when exercising or walking, just with a careful charging regime. If you're planning to use the Beoplay H5s solely while sitting on the sofa - I'd recommend them. If you want move, consider other options. The magnets are a nice touch though.
customer_reviews.author: John Allen

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god who the hell designed these? B&O? Ok then, I guess B&O are stupid! If you have the rubber boot over them, then they don't fit the charging cradle. If you don't have the rubber boot on them, then they fall out of your ear. So they're useless.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Brilliantly comfortable earphones
customer_reviews.text: Brilliantly comfortable earphones, with excellent sound and a really funky little charging unit. Sound quality has to be good, to match the price tag, and the earbuds allow for (in almost every case) a perfect fit. Bought as a treat for myself, well worth it - I'm hoping they'll prove very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted those headphones to be as good as they look. Unfortunately they are the most annoying piece of tech that I have had in a long time. They keep disconnecting from my phone, the charger only charges when it wants to and they had pairing issues with my Huawei Mate 20 pro as well. For the few minutes that they actually produced sound the quality was great.
customer_reviews.author: SHEM- Przemyslaw Orawiec

customer_reviews.title: If you appreciate a full, in depth and complete sound stage... Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Given the price and reputation of BO, pretty disappointed in the sound quality of these. Lows are significantly lacking. Mids and treble come through nicely and you are able to hear many pieces of music that you can't with other headphone but the overall sound stage is simply lacking. And don't bother trying to work out if it involves fast pace movement, simply become loose and you're constant adjusting. With the price of these, I have cheap £30 Sony's that give a fuller listening experience and that's just disappointing. Colleagues that have these feel the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Pros - They sound amazing Cons - Wire noise - Charging Block?.. - Weak magnets - Fiddly to fit correctly I’d get these if you sit perfectly still like a statue while listening to them ie: Office? And your ears have the most perfectly formed ear canal, free of imperfections, cleaned twice daily by nanobot technology.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: For £200 i expected a better sound quality but they are well made & look ...
customer_reviews.text: For £200 i expected a better sound quality but they are well made & look great. My major problem is the magnets which hold them on your neck when you're not using them. They're very weak & it's very likely they'll fall off without you noticing so you'll lose £200 pretty quickly
customer_reviews.author: Jon Averill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Exercise or travel use
customer_reviews.text: Earphones look fantastic and the sound quality is utterly amazing given the size, and turning them off by clipping together is very cool Very sturdy build - I would definitely recommend the silicone buds for comfort & keeping in place Battery life is decent - however you do need to remember to charge them daily for heavy use. only slightly annoying bits are the remote buttons which can be a bit fiddly and the charger being specific to this particular model
customer_reviews.author: Michael Born

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headphones for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about how good the sound would be over bluetooth but I was surprised to hear that the sound quality is brilliant. My review would be 5 stars if the battery life was longer and the charger wasn't a funny wee cube thing... there's no need for proprietary charging connectors in this day and age.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Herd

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and Pick Up noise from clothing
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely not worth the money. The cable around the neck picks up noise from rubbing the collar of your clothes or scarf. All sizes of the buds both the rubber and the foam ones are uncomfortable and pop out regularly. Absolute waste of money, I've gone back to the free apple ones.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Sound was very tinny
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't like the sound. I've been using the old wired Bose Soundsport. Switching to this I found the sound extermely tinny with no depth and bass. It was also a hassle to have to take off the accompanying ear holder to have to charge the headphones. One thing I did like about it was the braided wire, which I think would last longer than a typical rubber wire. Returned same day.
customer_reviews.author: Nadir Coowar

customer_reviews.title: String not insulated- ruins sound
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, but the string rubs on your coat/ clothes etc and transmits the sound straight to the ear buds- completely ruins the high quality B&O sound.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to fit and stay in your ear
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to wear and keep in your ear. I had beats before and could very easily put them in my ear without any problems. These are very difficult to keep in ear, I tried everything with no success
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wireless in-ear headphones
customer_reviews.text: Nicest in-ear headphones I've had. The battery life is good, the pairing is simple, all the different buds are helpful and sound quality is typical B&O standards (so excellent.) Only negative is the charging cradle... It's proprietary so if I ever lost it, I suspect it would be awkward and expensive to replace. It looks cool though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've got other Ines which don't fall out which I use for sport but these h5's I use for best, listening to music in car
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these if you want them for sport as they will fall out, But apart from that these are stunning from quality to sound, I've got other Ines which don't fall out which I use for sport but these h5's I use for best , listening to music in car, on holidays and at home , they even connect to my Apple TV 4 for music and movies , sound is flawless music and movies !, I've got klipsch , beats had Bose and more and these h5's whoop them all
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounds , VERY Poor battery, ear fins
customer_reviews.text: Sounds and volume on these headphones are outstanding, lightweight and durable. If you use the ear fins then its annoying that you have to remove them every time you charge them, which is a lot due to the poor battery life. As mentioned above unfortunately you feel like you are constantly charging them due to the poor battery, slightly disappointing considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: Great in every way anbd TBH I prefer the one with the rope as you can taje them out of our ears and still have them handy around you neck
customer_reviews.author: OrangeThoughts

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding appearance
customer_reviews.text: B&O's earphones always have a stethoscope effect, but the level of appearance is great. I prefer bose for performance, especially since it can connect two phones at the same time, which is very important for me.
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: They stopped working after a couple of weeks!
customer_reviews.text: These are great earphones. Fantastic sound. But I had to return them after a short time because they stopped working. Only way to get them working was to reset them then sync them back to your device! I'll wait until they bring out a second edition.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: There ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to buying Bose but thought I would give B&O a try they are a nice sound but when watching films ect there is a time lapse which puts me off I don't know if all wireless headphones are the same but not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Digi

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound
customer_reviews.text: Got these today for a present easy to use. Sound quality brilliant you definitely get what you pay for would get again I’d I had to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: gilly123

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, perfect pair with the B&O App (for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, perfect pair with the B&O App (for iPhone and iPad). 1 have 2 weeks use and the battery life is very good. Charging is a wonderful and exquisite procedure. Great soundstage, perfect Trebles, balanced Mids and a fine tuned Bass (all these for my taste of listening). I also use the "Equalizer" App in my iPhone so i can adjust the settings to my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Tiago Carneiro

customer_reviews.title: most amazing sound quality ever
customer_reviews.text: most amazing sound quality ever, really comfortable fit and secure when training in the gym. Only criticism I would say is that the supporting app is pointless as it does nothing - was expecting at least a graphic equaliser on it. Holds a reasonable charge as I use it a lot I guess but do need to charge every night
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy though its a premium product
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered long time ago and just today i connected and tried to use it and I find very difficult to fit into ears. I thought being it is a premium product it would be very comfort but seems not so
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Gave them a shot, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using B&O, as being really critical, can't believe i am saying that, they are great. Sound quality is just amazing.i didn't expect this much sound definition from them to be honest. Though if you are looking for punchy bass, this might be not for you, but that's just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Sound and build quality everything you'd expect from b&o. Battery life is a blatant lie though hence the 3 stars. At any decent volume you'll be lucky to get hour and half
customer_reviews.author: robert quinn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound charging a bit annoying but you'll get over it
customer_reviews.text: They are a good set if you want something with great sound quality but the only problem I found is the charging Dock it's a bit annoying to have to take off the fins that keep the earbuds in your ears if they machined them so the fins slot in also it would be perfect but in saying that excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: William Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but no so good in the fitness of my ears. After some time of fitting. It is much better. And I always use it in my daily life.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great set, great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Another set of excellent headphones. Using these for running and they stay in even after long runs. Sound is great and combined with the BeoPlay app you'll get the sound you want. Even if one falls out you won't lose them as they are tied around your neck. I prefer this concept to Apple's AirPods.
customer_reviews.author: Joerg Lothmann

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: As the wire is to tight, earphones always falling out from ears. Overpriced for uncomfortable earphones. Nice sound, but 70% you pay just for the brand name.
customer_reviews.author: B_Erdes

customer_reviews.title: Getting it in Pink probably wasn't the best idea
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a present for my sister. She absolutely loves them, however the cord does pick up dirt so getting them in pink probably wasn't the best idea.
customer_reviews.author: BrokenFlame

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok... but downside for me is that they keep falling off from my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Ana M

customer_reviews.title: the ratings on the Amazon were not good, but I got them today and I'm delighted
customer_reviews.text: I was scared when I bought these earphones, the ratings on the Amazon were not good, but I got them today and I'm delighted! The sound is clear, very deep bass and this build quality oh yesss ! just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Iwona S.

customer_reviews.title: Wire too long, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Shame I really wanted to like these but after the first pair turned up and didn't work, the second pair were so uncomfortable even when changing the earbuds. The wire is too long and when you use the clips provided to shorten the wire length, the extra length of wire again pulls them out of your ear. The quality of the earphones are great though, sound is lovely but putting up with the wire length makes them too hard to live with. Over the head headphones for me from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Sadly had to return as similar to other reviewers they do not stay in my left ear. I really was looking forward to using these for the daily train journey but could not justify the £200 price tag. The quality is lovely though as is the charging cube. I feel they are too bulky compared to other earphones and so I will be waiting for the next gen.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Not a good fit . The cord tends to grip your neck or clothing therefore when you turn your head pulls the earpiece out cord not long enough. Because not a snug fit effects the sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Larry D.

customer_reviews.title: Feminine and excellent ratio price and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I was really searching for a comfortable set of high quality earbuds!! with a perfect classical sound quality and i am really enjoying them. It is a certain price yes but worth it . Very easy to maintain and recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs P ZENOU

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, Poor cable
customer_reviews.text: The cable tends to get bent into strange shapes and cannot be straightened. The outside of the cable seems to be the issue but it may be metal wiring on the inside. Good sound quality and very handy to leave around your neck due to the magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great but poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones but low autonomy. Sound is top of the line though.
customer_reviews.author: Deeptrax

customer_reviews.title: Best Earbuds on the Market in my opinion !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would say that earbuds are best i have bought, the only down side for me is the fitting in my ears when I get them in they are brilliant. I’am going to have ear moulds made for them which will sort it out ! But i would 100% recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Timperley

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend, they fall out of your ears as you run. Also they sound isnt as great as other B&O products. I got the Bose ones before these and would recommend them a lot more..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them and wld highly recommend , says the sounds is brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Morag Nisbet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but needs s9me small tweaks.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and attractive design. Charging dock whilst it is somewhat unusual or innovative doesn’t suit practical use. The clasp ring for securing any lose cables serves no purpose also and tends to pop off.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Downey

customer_reviews.title: Download the B&O app to make the most of the sound you want.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sound & look/feel good too. I’ve used Etymotic for years and prefer more “in-ear” phones, but these are the best I’ve used outside those. Charge time could be better/longer is the only real negative.
customer_reviews.author: TMcC

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality of sound for music and games brilliant sound
customer_reviews.author: kirsty cocksedge

customer_reviews.title: Longer cable would be better
customer_reviews.text: It's good but the cord is not long enough especially if you are wearing a coat or scarf, so it's not suitable for winter walks. If it's cord's length 4-5cm more, it would be best in its class.
customer_reviews.author: Serdal Guzel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth cuts out with my old phone, only seems to happen with these though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are ‘THE BEST’ earphones I’ve used in a long time! Considering they are wireless it’s near impossible to tell the difference between them and a wired pair...!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and stunning design
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and stunning design. They stay in your ears provided you take the time to find the correct size silicone bits. The Bluetooth signal cuts out intermittently if the signal is blocked by another phone, for example. The material of the cable is a serious design flaw - its rubs on clothing and makes a noise which, is frankly, unacceptable for £200 earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bradley R Hillson

customer_reviews.title: good but ?
customer_reviews.text: good sound but as a few others say the buds can fall out when cable is round the neck, for such a premium product thats not great
customer_reviews.author: lee goodall

customer_reviews.title: Headphones missing
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived fully sealed BUT with the headphones missing. Pathetic lack of quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: As with all b&o products they’re great quality and very durable!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: B&O
customer_reviews.text: I have very good references from B & O for a few years now. I hope with this acquisition, do not disappoint. I recognize that the battery life of 5 hours is low, although the equipment is small. * Delivery of the order within the time limits. *****
customer_reviews.author: XIXANXUN

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: They belong to my son, who loved everything about them
customer_reviews.author: Keith Nash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great design, excellent sound and a bargain at the discounted rate I purchased them at. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... I have bought - the sound and comfort are amazing but every 6 months they overheat and kink out
customer_reviews.text: 3rd pair that I have bought - the sound and comfort are amazing but every 6 months they overheat and kink out. I used them 3-4 times a week for running! great product but not durable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, wish they had more than a 4 hour battery life but I am really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Fitness
customer_reviews.text: It is not quite suitable to fit my ear but anyway sound quality is okay
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable fit. Tried all combinations of earpieces
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable fit. Tried all combinations of earpieces, but they are not a good shape and thend to fall out easily due to the weight and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Husbo

customer_reviews.title: Faulty/Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Product worked fine for first use. Re-charged earphones, however can only get 10-15 minutes of play time off 1 full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set up and use. The sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Harrex

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery but otherwise a good product
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is shocking, if you commute on long journeys I don't recomend, but the quality is great and the sound is great
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and great build quality
customer_reviews.text: Sublime sound, bought to go with iPhone 7 as no headphone jack . Easy set up and great build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falling out of the ear constantly
customer_reviews.text: Sound is perfect; fits horribly - falls out of the ears and for that reason impossible to use when you move.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Granados

customer_reviews.title: Ear buds are too big for me.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t fit my ear even I have tried every size of ear bud tips, and it’s easy to drop off when running.
customer_reviews.author: RIXIA

customer_reviews.title: Connection problems
customer_reviews.text: Good when working but get disconnected frequently after 45 minutes even after fully charged
customer_reviews.author: zahid ahmed

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with android, and very bad sound quality absolutely no bass.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Worthy
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and beautiful sound,but a little bit easy to slip
customer_reviews.author: Binglu Wang

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life - You're lucky if you get 1 hour
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as 5, but you're lucky if you get 1
customer_reviews.author: Philip Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound and build quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product as expected. Unbeatable sound, Very comfortable to use, Delighted
customer_reviews.author: P Wroot

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and design but a pain to always charge ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and design but a pain to always charge and difficult to stay in the ear, impossible when moving!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect sound
customer_reviews.text: It became better after a period of use. And It’s very beautiful. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: yuting

customer_reviews.title: good sound
customer_reviews.text: good sound! nice appearance but bad calling, short battery time
customer_reviews.author: shin ik hang

customer_reviews.title: Headphones and delivery service above expectation
customer_reviews.text: Nice wireless headphones among the best in the market. Smooth delivery as promised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound. U need to carry the charging dock around.
customer_reviews.author: ibrahim mirsha

customer_reviews.title: Get the right tips and they're great.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was really excited about these headphones, then incredibly disappointed. The things just would not stay in my ears no matter how hard I tried, used different buds, tried to reshape my ear canal. They were absolutely useless for exercise that involved any degree of effort beyond sitting very, very still. Then I discovered the comply TX200 isolation tips. Brilliant! 45 mins run yesterday afternoon and the H5s didn't move at all. The tip options that come with the H5 aren't good enough. Switch to the (right size) TX200s and it's great. Really pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: AlexR

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound but volume switch falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these headphones and initially thought they are worth every penny. (I have a B&O speaker too). The problem I have found is that the volume switch casing has literally started to fall apart and it's just at a matter of time before it does and I can no longer use the headphones. I've tried to find warranty details as I've only had them 6 months, and think I've just been unlucky to get a faulty pair. If anyone knows how I can get these replaced please do let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are the best headphones I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: It's just in the sound, isn't it? Because the rest is quite a pain in the butt. The charging system with its dedicated pod that you need to take with you wherever, the headphones themselves are quite heavy and tend to fall from the ears, and the battery life is about three hours. However having said all that, they are the best headphones I've ever had. The sound it's just incredible Would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dorin Claici

customer_reviews.title: Very good. Recommend using comply 'isolation' earbuds instead of those ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Recommend using comply 'isolation' earbuds instead of those supplied. Greatly improves sound. Very reliable and stable and battery lasts well - about 3 to 4 hours so fine for commuting and gym etc. Very happy and would recommend. But seriously, do not judge these until you have tried them with better earbuds than those supplied. The ‘sport’ earbuds mine came with let way too much sound in and the bass lost its weight and impact.
customer_reviews.author: YouG

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. However the Bluetooth is not good at all! Not intuitive one bit, drops out a lot and isn't as straight forward as other brands like BOSE to link back. Also they need more options to fit into your ear. Everyone who's tried them so far hasn't fitted them. They keep falling out. B&O need to do some serious work to get this to the level of the price tag attached. It not worth it right now
customer_reviews.author: zutalor

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Microphonics
customer_reviews.text: Such a shame. If you sit perfectly still and don't move your head then they sound terrific, which is what gets them 2 stars. The 3 lost stars are for the worst microphonics I have ever heard under normal use. Really distracting and totally ruins them. Would recommend the Onkyo e700bt as a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: It has taken a while to get used to these headphones but I am there now. I use the B&O (Beoplay) app to enhance the sound and I am very satisfied with my stylish purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Johnsuper

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and comfortable. Just 4 stars due to quite poor battery life
customer_reviews.author: MultiDoc

customer_reviews.title: attention à l'ergonomie
customer_reviews.text: N'est pas adapté à toutes les oreilles: 4 personnes les ont essayé le soir de Noël, celle à qui ces écouteurs avaient été offerts n'arrivait pas à les faire tenir en place. Produit renvoyé.
customer_reviews.author: sjdl

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointing. Despite the poor reviews I thought I'd make my own opinion however after a couple of days the lower than average sound quality forced me to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: One word – SUPERB!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones as you would expect. Teh sound quality is awesome, the fit is great (use the comply tip, silicone tips are always rubbish) and there is LOADS of volume. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: purewhite creative

customer_reviews.title: Music Bliss
customer_reviews.text: Just Amazing works a treat and has a great little app for iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of headphones, sennheiser ie80, bose qc25... each has its own purpose. This is my first Bluetooth headphones and it doesn't deliver! Always connects to other people's devices even when I am listening to the music! Low sound quality too, but since I am not paying for the sound quality, it's ok. But connecting to others's devices? Sorry, already sold for half of what I paid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most failure of this black friday. I can’t ...
customer_reviews.text: The most failure of this black friday. I can’t charge it with earphone wings. silicone tips are not fit on my ears and their is noise (or cracking sound sometimes) when I listen to bass part.
customer_reviews.author: Hwan Soo Ok

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The earphone is cool, but there's a lot of noise when you rub the string.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia.X

customer_reviews.title: Be confident when buying..
customer_reviews.text: After two months, the control panel falls off and the wires start to fray. The earbuds get damaged because they are very fragile. Sound quality is perfect. After spending this much money and they don't refund or at least replace them. In the future they should take action if you are considering spending 200 POUNDS.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey.chok

customer_reviews.title: Not the best considering B&O are one of the best
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be a really good set of phones, the challenge I have found is that despite having all sorts of optional buds to try out, it's not a great fit for the ear. Now others may find them much better. The sound is great but I also found that they don't pair well to my iPad for watching a film, great for music but for some weird reason they only work for music. I eventually found they fit best but inverting them so they go in the opposite ear they are meant for upside down, seems to work for me, but I wouldn't recommend them to anyone as I didn't find them very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Hopeless if you've my ears.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these. The sound quality was great and they looked fantastic. However, I bought them for wearing as I was walking/running and they just do not stay in your ears. I tried every combination of ear buds and had no success. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Hodgins

customer_reviews.title: Very Weird!  It stops and resume the music being played.  It jumps to the next song... it opens another app...
customer_reviews.text: How can I ask for a replacement? The bluetooth connection is very unstable... it makes weird on and off when being used... if not, it jumps to the next song... if not, it opens another app like handsfree car navigation.... I'm pairing it with my Samsung Note Edge. I thought it was android issues. I tried to pair it with iPhone 6s -- same thing happens. I tried to reset the connection by pressing +/- buttons simultaneously -- same thing happens. I charged it fully -- same. I had it since July last year, and I'm only using it like 4 times a month. This weird thing happened a month or 2 since I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont fit, loose them even when I walk, ...
customer_reviews.text: Dont fit, loose them even when I walk, magnetic clip way too weak, they open all the time, big risk to loose them AND: charger does not work and why not just an USB cable instead of this ridicolous charging dock
customer_reviews.author: a_million_books

product_meta.title: Bang & Olufsen Beoplay H5 In-Ear Wireless Bluetooth Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black| Style Name:Without AccessoriesBeoplay H5 wireless earphones deliver an immersive listening experience with the power to go anywhere with you. Conveniently pair them with your Bluetooth device to bring the beauty of music into your active everyday life. Whether you’re out running, listening to podcasts on your daily commute or relaxing at home with your favourite tunes, these wireless earbuds will deliver outstanding Bang & Olufsen Signature Sound to suit your activity. The Beoplay App lets you customize your listening experience via your smartphone or Apple Watch, ensuring that you can enjoy music the way the artists intended. Combined with a splash- and dust-resistant design, these elegant Beoplay H5 earphones are as fashionable as they are functional. To ensure optimal fit and sound quality, each pair comes with seven sets of earbud tips in various sizes – four made from silicone and three made from rugged and breathable Comply Sport foam. When not in use, your wireless earphones can rest comfortably and securely around your neck – simply click the magnets on the earbuds together. Not only is this a convenient hands-free way to keep your earphones accessible, clicking the batteries together also initiates power-down to conserve battery life. When you’re ready to recharge, the sleek magnetic USB charging cube quickly and easily provides up to five hours of power to meet the demands of your mobile lifestyle. Adjust the volume on my Beosound Balance: To control the volume of your Beosound Balance, swipe along the circle line of the touch aluminium surface on the top. You can adjust the volume in one singular motion or in several incremental steps. A clockwise motion will turn the volume up and counterclockwise will turn the volume down. The volume indicator lights on the top will indicate the current volume level.

BOX CONTAINS


 * Beoplay H5 earphones
 * USB charging cube
 * Comply sport ear tips with sweat guard (S, M, L)
 * Silicone ear tips (XS, S, M, L)
 * Cable clip (three pieces)
 * Silicone fins (S, M, L)
 * Carrying pouch
 * Quick start guide
feature_bullets: Beoplay app lets you choose presets or adjust settings via your smartphone or Apple watch to customise your earphones sound profile to your activity
Beoplay H5 come with a choice of ear tips including Comply Sport, ideal for exercise or life on the go
When not in use durable splash and dust resistant earbuds magnetically connect to conserve battery power and hang securely around your neck
Long-lasting battery provides up to 5 hours of power between charges to keep your earphones as active as you are
Wireless earphones are tuned by acclaimed sound engineers to deliver immersive Bang & Olufsen signature sound on the go. Impedance : 16 Ohm

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
